PHRASE.LANG: Those were some excellent moves. Build your own Winter Wonderland in your apartment! [#Legal]
Excellentes décisions. Faites de votre appartement un véritable Pays des Merveilles Hivernal ! [#Legal]
Das war wirklich tolle Moves. Baue dein eigenes Winterwunderland in deinem Appartement! [#Legal]
Delle mosse davvero eccellenti. Crea il tuo paese delle meraviglie d'inverno nel tuo appartamento! [#Legal]
¡Has estado increíble! ¡Crea tu propio País de las Maravillas Invernal en tu apartamento! [#Legal]
Those were some excellent moves. Build your own Winter Wonderland in your apartment! [#Legal]
